description: purple paper-covered book with swirling and dripping dyes on pages, with one line of printed text near top of each page; smaller, folded print between each dyed page; rust and tan mottled clamshell box

medium: Artist's book: hand-colored etchings and letterpress on hand-dyed paper; housed in a linen over boards tray case

Brighton Press, San Diego
signed: On colophone page at back, in pencil: 23/30/ Sandra Alcosser/ M Burgess
title: The Blue Vein
